subject: Re: VAM PRO
description_text:
Le sam. 13 déc. 2025, 16:02, Minkay <minkay.mv@gmail.com> a écrit :

> HELLO
> I have a problem with the vam pro, they are not detected by the software,
> i have no problem with my pedals. I can used it with simhub but nothing in
> your software
>
> everything is wired
>
> Can you help me
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Minkay,  If the VAM Pro works when you click the “Vibration Test” in our SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2, it means the connections are fine. May I ask which game you are using? Currently, our official support covers about a dozen games, but with SimHub integration, over 100 games are supported.
